#define DEBUG   0
#define MAKE_RECIPIE (   _recipie,
  _source,
  _do_mid_layers,
  _do_last_layer 
)

macro used to construct a derived recipie class. Creates named accessors for each layer

Parameters:
_recipie name of the class to be created
_source the type of the underlying source (the type of the first underlying source not encapsulated in the recipie)
_do_mid_layers this argument to the macro is a macro itself. It is of the form: { _layer(<layer-name>,<layer-source-class>, <layer-data>, <layer-dimensionality>, <layer-precision>, <preceeding-layer-in-the-stack | INPUT>) }*
_do_last_layer this argument to the macro is a macro itself. It is of the form: _layer(<layer-name>,<layer-source-class>, <layer-data>, <layer-dimensionality>, <layer-precision>, <preceeding-layer-in-the-stack | INPUT>)

  • example

A congeal recipie for a translate, rotate, warp of a volume define my_mid_layers(_layer) \ _layer(Interp, SourceAccessorLinearInterpolateOf, Pixel8BitGrey, 3, Real, INPUT) \ _layer(Translate0, SourceTransformTranslateOf, Pixel8BitGrey, 3, Real, Interp) \ _layer(Rotate, SourceTransformRotateOf, Pixel8BitGrey, 3, Real, Translate0) \ _layer(Translate1, SourceTransformTranslateOf, Pixel8BitGrey, 3, Real, Rotate)

define my_last_layer(_layer) \ _layer(Warp, SourceTransformWarpOf, Pixel8BitGrey, 3, Real,Translate1)

MAKE_RECIPIE( Recipie_G3R_All_G3I, GreyVolume, my_mid_layers, my_last_layer );

#define PRIVATE   CONCAT(_privateNS,__LINE__)
